image.description: Woman wearing a silver dress with a stoll, scarf and hat and holding a flag with a C.
image.caption: F. Earl Chris.

back.text: Jan 22 '08. Rec'd your letter this morning. I was certainly gladly surprised. I wanted to send a Harvard card but could fine none so will send you a Cornell. I was glad to hear from you. Don't get discouraged. You did finely for the first time.
